modName: Faster Transform - To Werewolf and VampireLord
summary:
To transform faster human to werewolf or werebear or vampire lord.
"Quick" omit transforming animation as short as possible. "Half" is twice as fast as the vanilla transforming animation.
This mod does not have script and esp. It only is changed animations.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]zijjAea36RY[/youtube]

日本語の[url=http://skyrimshot.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-52.html]記事[/url]
My blog [url=https://skyrimshot.blogspot.jp/2017/09/fastertransform.html]Article[/url]

To transform faster human to werewolf or werebear or vampire lord.
You can choose two options.
[b]"Quick"[/b] omit to transform animation as short as possible.
[b]"Half"[/b] is twice as fast as the vanilla transforming animation.

This mod does not have script and esp. It only is changed animations.

-------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#fff2cc][size=3][b]Installation[/b][/size][/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------------

Install with NMM:
1) Download from "Download with manager" button on Nexus.
2) Press the "Activates the selected Mod" button.
3) Select if you need options.

Install with Wrye Bash:

1) Run Wrye Bash.
2) Select the mod in the Installers tab of Wrye Bash and then drag and drop FasterTransform.7z file.
3) When asked if you want to copy or move, you chose either one.
4) Right-clicked and then select the wizard.
5) Select if you need options.
6) Check the Apply these selections and Install this package and then press the finish at the end.

Manual Install:

1) Extract the downloaded archive to a temporary location.
2) Then move it to the Skyrim "Data" folder.


In regard to optional files:

00 Werewolf Quick: Instantly transform human to werewolf(werebear) animation.
01 Werewolf Half: Transform human to werewolf(werebear) animation is twice as fast as the vanilla.
02 VampireLord Quick: Instantly transform human to vampire lord animation.
03 VampireLord Half: Transform human to vampire lord animation is twice as fast as the vanilla.


-------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------
